synergyText: RegularDamage=(Level200×130×ATKDDEF)×Modifier

The initial target takes 100% of the damage, the second takes 70%, and the third takes 60%. The chain of damage will fail to continue to the next target if the damage was blocked by the current target. Damage can be blocked if the target who would have taken damage has the Evading Condition or the Electric Synthesize Trait.

description: If HP is above 50%, allies restore 10% of max HP and rivals lose 15% of max HP.
